messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, As a local resident, I know this area well. Stone constituency has much to offer, but has many issues too. I will fight for a better deal for Stafford Hospital to restore much needed services. I oppose HS2 as this unwanted vanity project will cost billions that we simply can’t afford. I will fight to protect our green landscapes and campaign against wind turbines which cost a fortune and don’t even generate much electricity. Time for a change - VOTE UKIP!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a better deal for Stafford Hospital to restore much needed services.
Oppose HS2 as it's an unwanted vanity project that will cost billions.
Protect green landscapes and oppose wind turbines which cost a fortune and don’t even generate much electricity.

issues.environment: Protect green landscapes and campaign against wind turbines which cost a fortune and don’t even generate much electricity.
